author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
GENERAL

TNAU: All Indian Inter-Agricultural Universities sports and games meet, K. Ramalingam, Chief Commissioner of Income Tax, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: entrepreneurship week on “Innovative ideas for a better world”, 1.45 p.m. ; awareness programme on “Interacting with Women at Workplace – The Nuances”, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology: workshop on elements of environmental engineering for polytechnic students, KKCAS seminar hall, 9.30 a.m.; workshop on improving leadership skills for facing interview, 9.30 a.m.

AJK College of Arts and Science: symposium, 10 a.m.

KTVR Knowledge Park: seminar,

11 a.m.

BAI, IIA and ACCE (I): launch of BuildMat 2017, R. Srinivasan, managing director of Saint-Gobain India, chief guest, The Residency Towers, 6 p.m.

Coimbatore Management Association: annual management day programme, S. Madhavan, Cognizant Foundation, The Residency, 6.30 p.m.

KGK-TI and ABK-AOTS Dosokai: launch of centre for manufacturing excellence, ND Hall, SIEMA building, 6.45 p.m.

CSED: consultation with trade unions on the issue of adolescent and women workers in textile industry, Hotel Park Inn, 10 a.m.

GKNM Hospital: diabetic footcare and treatment clinic, 2 p.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore
